item.title: British Fintech Revolut Views Asia Pacific as Key for Expansion
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- The Asia-Pacific region is one of the keys for global expansion at London-based Revolut Ltd., including markets such as Australia, New Zealand and Singapore, according to the fintech company’s head of growth. “Accelerating Revolut’s growth in APAC markets remains a top priority,” Char...

item.title: Fidelity Fund Raises Value of Stake in Musk’s X by 4.4% in April
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Fidelity’s Blue Chip Growth Fund raised the value of its position in Elon Musk’s X by 4.4% in April. Fidelity, which gained its stake by helping Musk complete his $44 billion purchase of what was then known as Twitter, valued its position at $5.51 million as of April 30, according to ...

item.title: UBS Fined by Swiss for Failing to Report Yemen-Linked Accounts
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS AG has been fined 50,000 Swiss francs ($55,000) by Swiss authorities for failing to report cases of suspected money laundering linked to the ex-president of Yemen, Ali Abdullah Saleh. The amount is the highest possible penalty the Swiss finance ministry could hand down to a legal ...

item.title: Swiss Capital Demands Hurt UBS Stability, Cevian Founder Says
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Switzerland’s proposal to significantly increase capital requirements for UBS Group AG will be counterproductive for the bank’s stability and the country’s interests, according to a major activist investor in the bank. “If you have requirements that are too high, you won’t achieve th...

item.title: UBS Makes Karofsky and Khan Wealth Co-Heads in Management Shakeup
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- UBS Group AG appointed investment bank head Rob Karofsky to run its US business and jointly oversee wealth with Iqbal Khan, in a management shakeup that paves the way for a race to succeed Chief Executive Officer Sergio Ermotti. Khan, who previously had sole charge of the key wealth u...

item.title: Teilen und Herrschen im Reich UBS

item.author: Cash.
item.description: Wie funktioniert die Tokenisierung? Insgesamt geht es bei der Tokenisierung um die Abbildung von Vermögenswerten in Form von Blockchain Tokens. Anlege...
